title: documentation doc/code.html outdated
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Section "Go source files":

"At the moment, the Go tools impose a restriction that package names are unique
across all packages linked into a single binary, but that restriction will be lifted
soon."

What is the expected output?
Delete this sentence -or- explain that package names need not be unique.

Please provide any additional information below.
- documentation bug
